DataElement.preferredName: Subject Activity Group Reuse Template Study Activity Repeat Duration ISO21090.PQ.TIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A collection of activities from a global library that would be performed on a common subject at approximately the same time. EXAMPLE(S): Clinic visit during which a physical exam, a blood test, and a substance administration occur. Telephone contact during which temperature, blood pressure and adverse events are reported. Recording multiple observation results in a diary. The period of time over which the activity is repeated.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.:Any number of entities (members) considered as a unit.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._Make or do or perform again.:The period of time during which something continues.
